result.execSummary:
The defendant Nickolas S. Bonadore was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Nickolas S. Bonadore is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Nickolas S. Bonadore was found guilty of Possession of Narcotic Drugs [Modifiers: Repeater], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.  This applies to all counts and financial obligations.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.  Do not possess or consume alcoholic beverages and do not have alcoholic beverages within the residence.  Do not possess or consume controlled substances, except by prescription.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program. 
** Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.  If unpaid financial obligations remain at discharge or revocation, civil judgment to be entered.  Submit a DNA sample (unless previously provided).
** Pay DNA surcharges.   Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action.  May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

timeConds.notes: AS A CONDITON OF PROBATION.   Credit since the 9/26/16 order to detain.  Huber for employment and treatment.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.    Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by agent.  Counseling shall specifically include:  Alcohol / drug.
  Actively search for employment, be employed or attend an educational institution or vocational training program.  
++COURT COSTS STILL DUE AND OWING.  Cooperate with the Child Support Agency to establish paternity and/or to pay child support and make all court appearances in any paternity action. May Not have contact with drug users or dealers, George Bonadore unless otherwise permitted by the agent.   May not possess any weapons, including firearms.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nickolas S. Bonadore
